description: Google Chrome has achieved its "highest score ever" on the Speedometer 3 browser performance benchmark, a company blog post announced. Chrome's performance has reportedly improved by 10 percent since August 2024, with browsers based on Google's open-source engine typically excelling in these tests.
title: Google Chrome Gets 'Highest Ever' Speedometer Score; Company Reveals Optimisations Behind Improved Performance

description: Nothing Phone 2 was launched in India in July 2022 as the second smartphone offering from the UK-based brand. Now, the Carl Pei-led company is all set to unveil the Nothing Phone 3 as a successor. It will debut in India and other international markets on July 1. As we wait for the formal reveal, the UK-based brand has disclosed the design elements of the Phone 3 through a fresh teaser.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Rear Panel Design Teased; Suggests Departure From Signature Glyph Design

description: Perplexity AI's CEO, Aravind Srinivas, has criticised Google's AI products and strategy while speaking at the Bloomberg Tech summit in San Francisco on Thursday. Srinivas panned Google’s AI assistant as a “terrible product” and also claimed the tech giant essentially introduces the same artificial intelligence feature year after year, without actually shipping it to users.
title: Perplexity AI CEO Pans Google’s AI Rollout and Assistant Product

description: Circle Internet's shares more than doubled in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday. The New York-based company's stock opened for trading at $69 (roughly Rs. 5,920) apiece, valuing the stablecoin issuer at nearly $18 billion (roughly Rs. 1,54,356 crore), on a fully-diluted basis.
title: Stablecoin Giant Circle's Shares Surge in Blowout NYSE Debut

description: CD Prjekt Red is not yet done with Cyberpunk 2077. The RPG is getting another update later this month, the developer announced at its REDstreams livestream for the game’s Nintendo Switch 2 launch on Thursday.
title: 'We're Not Done Yet': CD Projekt Red Confirms Cyberpunk 2077 Is Getting Another Update Later This Month

description: Microsoft introduced Copilot Shopping, an in-app product discovery and purchasing experience, for users on Wednesday. The Redmond-based tech giant’s new artificial intelligence (AI) feature will be available on the Copilot app for mobile and desktop, and it could be added to the web client as well. This AI-driven e-commerce experience will offer user-reviews about products, price comparisons across different platforms, and allow them to track the lowest possible prices.
title: Microsoft Introduces Copilot Shopping With Native Checkout Capability in App

description: Vivo Y19 5G was unveiled in India last month with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and a 5,500mAh battery. Now, the Chinese tech brand is reportedly gearing up to unveil a new Y series smartphone in the country soon. Although the moniker of the phone has not been revealed, it is tipped to come with a curved AMOLED display.
title: Vivo Y-Series Smartphone With Curved Display Said to Launch in India; Colour Options Leaked

description: Xiaomi Smart Band 10 could soon launch in select global markets. While the company has yet to officially announce the wearable, fresh leaks continue to emerge online. An earlier report hinted at the design and some key expected features. Now, newly surfaced alleged marketing materials once again suggest both the design and specifications of the upcoming smart band.
title: Xiaomi Smart Band 10 Leaked Marketing Images Suggest Design and Key Features

description: The Huawei Band 10 is equipped with an interesting set of features. The smart wearable device features a 1.47-inch AMOLED 2.5D display. The band comes equipped with 100 workout modes and uses AI-based fitness monitoring to track the performance of various sports. It also comes with 24-hour heart rate and SpO2 monitoring.
title: Huawei Band 10 First Impressions

description: Tecno Pova 7 Neo 4G could be launched soon in select global markets. Its design has surfaced online via leaked hands-on images. The retail box of the handset, as well as some of its key features, have leaked as well. The Neo 4G variant is expected to join the base Pova 7 5G and Pova 7 Ultra 5G models.
title: Tecno Pova 7 Neo 4G Design Spotted in Leaked Hands-On Images; Key Features Surface Online

description: Uber is looking to reduce the costs of processing international money transfers, and it is now analysing if stablecoins can help in the process. Dara Khosrowshahi, the CEO of Uber, spoke about Uber's ongoing stablecoin study phase during the Bloomberg Tech conference held this week in San Francisco.
title: Uber Reportedly Exploring Stablecoin Adoption to Cut Cross-Border Transfer Costs

description: Microsoft has announced the first wave of games joining Xbox Game Pass in June. EA Sports FC 25 leads the lineup of games joining the subscription service in the first half of the month. Other titles joining Game Pass include enhanced editions of Baldur’s Gate 1 and 2, Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine – Master Crafted Edition, launch title FBC: Firebreak, and more.
title: EA Sports FC 25, FBC: Firebreak and More Join Xbox Game Pass in June

description: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate Design in September last year as the world's first triple-screen foldable phone. Now, the Chinese smartphone brand is said to be working on the Huawei Mate XT 2. Ahead of the formal reveal, a tipster has suggested details about the Huawei Mate XT 2. The Huawei Mate XT 2 is said to go official in the second half of this year.
title: Huawei Mate XT 2 Tipped to Launch in H2 2025 With Upgraded Chipset, Cameras

description: PhonePe announced on Friday that it is planning to launch a Unified Payments Interface (UPI) solution for feature phone users in India. The digital payments and financial services company highlighted that the payment solution will be built on the UPI 123Pay technology. The service will be built on conversational engagement platform Gupshup’s GSPay tech stack.
title: PhonePe to Launch UPI Payments App for Feature Phones With P2P Transfers, Offline QR Payments

description: Google is reportedly adding real-time captions feature to Gemini Live. As per the report, the new feature will show text captions at the centre of the screen, enabling users to follow the verbal responses more easily. This accessibility feature will also help users who want to have a hands-free conversation with the chatbot, but do not want to raise the volume.
title: Google’s Gemini Live Is Reportedly Getting a Real-Time Captions Feature

description: Huawei Band 10 was launched in India on Friday. The smart band is claimed to offer up to 14 days of battery life and is available in polymer and aluminium alloy case options. It sports a 1.47-inch AMOLED rectangular display with Always On Display support. The smart wearable offers metrics like sleep-heart rate variability (HRV) and stress levels.
title: Huawei Band 10 With Up to 14 Days of Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Razer Phantom Collection was launched in India on Friday. The latest lineup of PC accessories features a translucent design that is a visual departure from traditional finishes on the company’s other offerings. The Razer Phantom Collection comprises four products — Razer Basilisk V3 Pro 35K, BlackWidow V4 75%, Razer Barracuda X Chroma, and Razer Firefly V2 Pro. Razer has equipped all of the PC accessories with Chroma RGB, a lighting system with an underglow that shines through their translucent chassis.
title: Razer Phantom Collection with Chroma RGB, Dynamic Lighting Support Launched in India: Check Price, Features

description: The overall crypto market tumbled by 2.70 percent over the last day. Bitcoin and Ether, both saw losses on Friday, June 6. The escalating tensions between Trump and Musk seem to have significantly impacted market sentiment. A majority of altcoins registered losses on Friday, including Solana, Dogecoin, Cardano, and Chainlink.
title: Bitcoin Falls to $102,700 Amid Fiery Trump-Musk Feud, Most Altcoins Log Losses

description: Google has reportedly started publicly testing its Search Live feature in AI Mode. As per the report, some users have begun spotting the new feature in the Google app on Android and iOS. Search Live was first announced at the company’s I/O 2025 keynote session as an extension to the AI Mode.
title: Google’s Search Live in AI Mode Reportedly Rolling Out to Some Users

description: Apple is said to be developing new MagSafe chargers that would enable faster wireless charging on the next-generation iPhone models. As per a report, the in-development charging pads were spotted on a certification website and may comply with Qi2.2 charging standards. While these are speculated to be backwards compatible with previous generation iPhone models, the purported iPhone 17 series will reportedly fully take advantage of it by benefitting from up to 50W wireless charging speeds.
title: iPhone 17 Could Support Up to 50W Wireless Charging With New Qi2.2 MagSafe Chargers: Report

description: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G will be unveiled in India later this month. The company has confirmed the launch date of the handset. The design and battery size of the upcoming smartphone have been revealed as well. It is expected to succeed the standard iQOO Z10 and iQOO Z10x variants, which were introduced in the country in April.
title: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G India Launch Date Set for June 18; Design, Battery Size Teased

description: About $22 billion (roughly Rs. 1,88,626 crore) of SpaceX's government contracts are at risk amid the ongoing feud between Donald Trump and Elon Musk. The disagreement, rooted in Musk's criticism of Trump's tax-cut and spending legislation that began last week, quickly spiraled out of control.
title: Musk-Trump Breakup Puts $22 Billion of SpaceX Contracts at Risk, Jolting US Space Program

description: OpenAI is appealing an order in New York Times' copyright case arguing that it conflicts with privacy commitments it has made with users. Last month, a court said OpenAI had to preserve and segregate all output log data after the Times asked for the data to be preserved.
title: OpenAI Appeals Data Preservation Order in NYT Copyright Case

description: Oppo K13x 5G will launch in India soon. The Chinese tech brand announced the arrival of the new K series smartphone through a press release on Friday. It will be available for purchase through Flipkart. The Oppo K13x 5G will be a direct successor to last year's Oppo K12x 5G. It is rumoured to feature a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and house a 6,000mAh battery with 45W fast charging support.
title: Oppo K13x 5G to Launch in India Soon; Confirmed to Go on Sale via Flipkart

description: Samsung on Thursday announced the expansion of a crucial health tracking feature to more countries. Sleep Apnea, which was introduced with the Galaxy Watch 7 and Watch Ultra models in the US, will now be available in 34 more European markets, in addition to Australia and Singapore. It is offered as a supplementary tool which leverages the Samsung Health app and the BioActive Sensor on the Galaxy Watch to monitor signs of obstructive sleep apnea.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch’s Sleep Apnea Feature Expands to Australia and 35 Other Countries

description: Tecno recently introduced its Pova Curve 5G in India. The company is now expected to unveil its Pova 7 series next. A recent report claimed that the base and Ultra Pova 7 series smartphones were spotted on the Google Play Console database. Meanwhile, a new leak has suggested the launch timeline of the Ultra variant. It has also shared the design and key features of the purported handset.
title: Tecno Pova 7 Ultra 5G Launch Timeline, Design and Key Features Surface Online

description: Tesla shares went into free-fall on Thursday as President Donald Trump publicly feuded with Elon Musk. Traders dumped Tesla in heavy trading after Musk quickly responded to Trump's criticism with social media posts that stepped up criticism of the president's tax bill. Trump fired back further, alleging Musk was upset because the bill takes away tax benefits for electric vehicle purchases.
title: Trump-Musk Row Slams Tesla Shares, $150 Billion in Market Value Wiped Out

description: Japan’s private moonshot ended in disappointment as ispace’s Resilience lander crashed during final descent. A delay in rangefinder data prevented timely deceleration, causing a hard landing on the lunar surface. This marks the company’s second failure. Despite the setback, ispace plans future missions in 2027 with the upgraded Apex 1.0 lander to continue Japan’s lunar exploration efforts.
title: Japanese Private Lunar Lander Resilience Fails Mission, Crashes on Moon

description: Sony held its State of Play broadcast Wednesday, where it shared new updates and trailers for upcoming games on the PS5. The livestream also featured a few surprise reveals and a new Sony controller. Here are the biggest announcements from the State of Play broadcast.
title: Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls, Nioh 3, Romeo Is a Dead Man: Biggest Announcements at Sony's State of Play

description: Motorola Edge 60 India launch date has been revealed. The company has also confirmed the colourways and RAM and storage options of the Indian variant. The new Edge series smartphone was launched in select global markets in April alongside the Motorola Edge 60 Pro. The Indian variant is confirmed to draw power from a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Set to Launch in India Next Week; Colour Options, Specifications Revealed

description: Samsung recently teased its upcoming foldables, emphasising the word 'Ultra'. This teaser sparked speculation that Samsung would introduce an Ultra-branded version of the Galaxy Z Fold lineup this year — Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra. However, a reliable tipster now claims that there will not be any Ultra model, instead the Galaxy Z Fold 7 will offer an Ultra experience.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra Isn’t Coming, Galaxy Z Fold 7 to Offer ‘Ultra’ Experience, Tipster Claims

description: Google introduced an upgraded version of the Gemini 2.5 Pro artificial intelligence (AI) model on Thursday. Available in preview, the new model’s technical name is “Gemini 2.5 Pro preview 06-05 Thinking” and it offers improved coding capabilities compared to the previous version which was released ahead of the Google I/O 2025.
title: Google Upgrades Gemini 2.5 Pro AI Model With Improved Coding Capabilities

description: This week on OTT: Don't miss fresh releases like Pattth, Stolen, Jaat, Bhool Chuk Maaf, The Survivors, and Predator: Killer of Killers. A perfect mix of thrillers, dramas, and action stories now streaming on Netflix, Prime Video, ZEE5 and more.
title: OTT Releases This Week (June 2 - June 8): Pattth, Stolen, Jaat, Bhool Chuk Maaf, and More

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE is expected to be unveiled in the coming months as a more affordable version of the upcoming Galaxy Z Flip 7. Ahead of their rumoured July launch, several leaks and reports have hinted at the expected key features and other details about the upcoming phones. A new report has now suggested the starting price of the Galaxy Z Flip 7 Fan Edition in South Korea.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE Price, Storage Options Leaked Again; Here's How Much It Could Cost

description: Snapchat on Thursday expanded its availability by launching a dedicated app for the Apple Watch. This new app allows users to preview an incoming message and reply to it using multiple options such as Dictation and Scribble. Alongside, the social media platform has also introduced its Lens Studio app on iOS and as a web tool which allows developers to create unique lenses using artificial intelligence (AI) and publish them for others to use.
title: Snapchat Launches Apple Watch App With Scribble, Dictation Support; Lens Studio Now on iOS

description: Smartphones in the budget segment usually focus on two primary factors – big, bright displays and long battery life. However, that has lately changed with manufacturers going above and beyond to incorporate features from a segment above or even two. High refresh rate screens, capable cameras, 5G connectivity, and AI capabilities, these are just some of the features that have trickled down from phones priced at a premium to offerings even under Rs. 15,000. Thus, we have curated a list of the top smartphones under Rs. 15,000 in India.
title: Top Smartphones Under Rs. 15,000 in India (June 2025): Samsung Galaxy M16, iQOO Z10x, Infinix Note 50X, More

description: At WWDC 2025 next week, Apple is expected to preview its upcoming OS iterations. While the rumour mill has suggested big changes coming to iOS 26, iPadOS 26 and most recently, visionOS 26, watchOS 26 may not be too far behind. As per a report, the Cupertino-based tech giant could finally introduce support for a highly requested feature on the Apple Watch — third party Control Centre widgets.
title: WWDC 2025: watchOS 26 to Reportedly Get Support for Third-Party Control Centre Widgets

description: The Realme GT 7 and 7T deliver a powerful performance in terms of battery, display, and overall capabilities. The 7000mAh battery, combined with 120W fast charging, sets a benchmark at this price point, while 6000 nits of peak brightness makes them brighter than the iPhone 16. The camera department is not the biggest highlight of the GT 7 series, though. For gaming enthusiasts, the phone can deliver on every front. Keeping in sync with market trends, the GT 7 and 7T feature a host of AI enhancements, which is a welcome addition.
title: Realme GT 7 and GT 7T Review: Power, Poise, and Pure Value
